tag_list: knowledge-creation, linked-data, xresults, ix, ulore, semantics, web-3-0, knowledge-system
overview:
“Intellectum valde ama”

The Visionary: The possible was once impossible until someone dared to make it possible. I seek to create a richer source of knowledge from past, present and future information on the world-wide web. In short, I’m that guy who wants to organize and add a consistent structure to all the information on the Internet. I envision a true web 3.0, and I aim to make it a reality.

The Professional: Information to knowledge is the next logical step and it is for this reason that I oversee the development of systems at XResults that aim to connect like information, regardless of location or source. With a diverse professional background that converges the field(s) of economics and software development, I’m adroit in the innovation of systems that take the world one step closer to a truly semantic web. Not always having a wealth of resources behind us, I’ve masterfully used outsourced as well as insourced professionals to achieve key development initiatives. With more than nine years in the emerging markets, I’ve been able to pretty much level the playing field.

The Man: Lead by example…. Inspiring people is what I do. My greatest pleasure in life comes from getting the most out of those around me.

“Competitors come and go. Hot companies rise and fall. Money can flow out as quickly as it flows in. But what must not change are: vision, integrity, awareness, passion and pursuit.”

  • EA Wade on a recent conference call

image.attribution: Ethan-Anthony Wade / XResults Inc.
